<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.19
<SEQUENCE>3
<FILENAME>y96162exv10w19.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.19: AMEND #3 TO REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE>EX-10.19: AMEND #3 TO REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY bgcolor="#FFFFFF">
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt"><B>Exhibit&nbsp;10.19</B>



<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">AMENDMENT NO. 3<BR>
TO REVOLVING CREDIT AGREEMENT



<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment No.&nbsp;3 to Revolving Credit Agreement, dated as of December
4, 2003 (this &#147;Amendment&#148;), amends that certain Revolving Credit Agreement,
dated as of May&nbsp;22, 2002, as amended by that certain Amendment No.&nbsp;1 dated as
of August&nbsp;29, 2002, and that certain Amendment No.&nbsp;2 dated as of May&nbsp;30, 2003
(as amended, the &#147;Credit Agreement&#148;), among Barnes &#038; Noble, Inc., a Delaware
corporation, (the &#147;Borrower&#148;), the lending institutions listed on Schedule&nbsp;1 to
the Credit Agreement (the &#147;Banks&#148;), Fleet National Bank, as administrative
agent for itself and each other Bank (in such capacity, the &#147;Administrative
Agent&#148;), ING Capital LLC, as documentation agent, Wachovia Bank, National
Association, as syndication agent, and Fleet Securities, Inc. and First Union
Securities, Inc. (d/b/a Wachovia Securities), as co-arrangers.


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS, the Borrower has requested certain amendments to the Credit
Agreement and the Bank parties hereto are willing to agree to such amendments.


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of these premises, the promises, mutual
covenants and agreements contained in this Amendment and fully intending to be
legally bound hereby, the parties hereby agree as follows:


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>1.&nbsp;Capitalized Terms. </B>Terms used in this Amendment which are not defined
herein, but which are defined in the Credit Agreement, shall have the same
respective meanings herein as therein.


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>2.&nbsp;Amendments to Credit Agreement.</B>


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.1 Amendment of Section&nbsp;1.1. The definition of &#147;Affiliated
Subsidiaries&#148; contained in Section&nbsp;1.1 of the Loan Agreement is amended by
adding the following proviso thereto (prior to the period at the end thereof):



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;, provided that any Subsidiary set forth in the preceding clause
(i)&nbsp;or (ii)&nbsp;shall no longer be considered an Affiliated Subsidiary from
and after the date upon which it becomes a wholly-owned Subsidiary of the
Borrower&#148;.


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.2 Amendment of Section&nbsp;1.1. The definition of &#147;Cumulative Excess Cash
Flow&#148; contained in Section&nbsp;1.1 of the Credit Agreement is amended (i)&nbsp;by
deleting the reference to &#147;February&nbsp;3, 2002&#148; contained therein; and (ii)&nbsp;by
inserting in place thereof the following: &#147;November&nbsp;2, 2003&#148;.



<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.3 Amendment of Section&nbsp;1.1. The definition of &#147;Qualified Investments&#148;
contained in Section&nbsp;1.1 of the Credit Agreement is amended to read in its
entirety as follows:



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">&#147;Qualified Investments. As applied to any member of the Borrower
Affiliated Group, investments in (i)&nbsp;notes, bonds or other obligations of
the United States of America or any agency thereof that as to principal
and interest constitute direct obligations of or are guaranteed by the
United States of America, (ii)&nbsp;certificates of deposit or other deposit
instruments or accounts of banks or trust companies organized under the
laws of the United States or any state thereof that have capital and
surplus of at least $100,000,000, (iii)&nbsp;commercial paper that is rated
not less than prime-one or A-1 or their equivalents by Moody&#146;s Investors
Service, Inc. or Standard &#038; Poor&#146;s Corporation, respectively, or their
successors, (iv)&nbsp;any repurchase agreement secured by any one or more of
the foregoing, (v)&nbsp;Investments in wholly-owned Subsidiaries (other than
any Affiliated Subsidiary); provided, however, that the aggregate amount
of Investments in Foreign Subsidiaries may not at any time exceed 10% of
the Borrower&#146;s Consolidated Tangible Net Worth determined as of the end
of the most recently completed fiscal quarter of the Borrower, (vi)&nbsp;loans
permitted by Section


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">33
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">6.13, (vii)&nbsp;from and after November&nbsp;2, 2003, Investments described in
clause (i)&nbsp;of the definition of Investments in B&#038;N.com in an aggregate
amount outstanding not to exceed $115,000,000, (viii)&nbsp;in addition to all
of the foregoing, from and after November&nbsp;2, 2003, Investments described
in clause (i)&nbsp;of the definition of Investments in connection with
Permitted Acquisitions; provided, however, that the aggregate
consideration (including all cash and non-cash consideration and any
assumption of Indebtedness, but excluding any Equity Securities of the
Borrower) for such Investments, together with all such consideration paid
in connection with Permitted Acquisitions not constituting Investments,
shall not exceed, when made, the sum of $105,000,000 plus 50% of the
Borrower&#146;s Cumulative Excess Cash Flow, and provided, further, that, with
respect to Investments in B&#038;N.com only, (a)&nbsp;Investments described in
clause (i)&nbsp;of the definition of Investments shall first be applied to the
basket referred to in clause (vii)&nbsp;above and, after such basket has been
fully utilized, to the basket under this clause (viii), (b)&nbsp;Investments
described in clause (ii)&nbsp;of the definition of Investments shall also be
permitted to be made under this clause (viii)&nbsp;in B&#038;N.com, and (c)&nbsp;the
aggregate Investments made in B&#038;N.com pursuant to this clause (viii)
shall not exceed when made $100,000,000 (the &#147;B&#038;N.com Sub-Limit&#148;), (ix)
Investments in Affiliated Subsidiaries and Investments in other
minority-owned Persons made prior to the date hereof and disclosed on
Exhibit&nbsp;D hereto, and (x)&nbsp;Interest Rate Protection Agreements for an
aggregate notional amount not to exceed $300,000,000 at any time
outstanding. Notwithstanding the foregoing, (a)&nbsp;in the event that the
Borrower makes Investments in B&#038;N.com under clause (viii)&nbsp;of the
foregoing provision and, subsequent to such Investments, B&#038;N.com becomes
a wholly-owned Subsidiary of the Borrower, the aggregate amount of all
such Investments shall be deemed to be available again under such clause
(viii)&nbsp;from the date upon which B&#038;N.com became a wholly-owned Subsidiary
(other than any amounts in excess of the Investments permitted under
clause (vii)&nbsp;above made on or after November&nbsp;2, 2003 which were used to
acquire any capital stock of B&#038;N.com except in connection with an
offering of rights to all shareholders of B&#038;N.com), and (b)&nbsp;prior to
B&#038;N.com becoming a wholly-owned Subsidiary of the Borrower, the Borrower
may, without such Investments being double-counted, convert any
Investment it has made in B&#038;N.com under clause (viii)&nbsp;of the foregoing
provision to an Investment made under clause (vii)&nbsp;thereof (subject to
the limitations contained in such clause (vii)), and any such amount
converted shall then no longer count against utilization of the B&#038;N.com
Sub-Limit.&#148;


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is understood and agreed by the Borrower that, for purposes of
determining the Borrower&#146;s compliance with Qualified Investments, the permitted
baskets in effect prior to the Amendment Effective Date shall continue to
govern such compliance for all periods ending on or prior to November&nbsp;1, 2003.


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.4 Amendment of Section&nbsp;1.1. The definition of &#147;Security Agreements&#148;
contained in Section&nbsp;1.1 of the Loan Agreement is amended to read in its
entirety as follows:



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Security Agreements. (a)&nbsp;The Security Agreements dated as of the
date hereof and executed and delivered by the Borrower and each Domestic
Subsidiary who is a member of the Borrower Affiliated Group to the
Administrative Agent, for the ratable benefit of the Banks and the
Administrative Agent, and (b)&nbsp;any other Security Agreements dated after
the date hereof and executed and delivered by a Domestic Subsidiary who
is a member of the Borrower Affiliated Group to the Administrative Agent,
for the ratable benefit of the Banks and the Administrative Agent.&#148;


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.5 Amendment of Section&nbsp;1.1. The definition of &#147;Pledge Agreements&#148;
contained in Section&nbsp;1.1 of the Loan Agreement is amended to read in its
entirety as follows:



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Pledge Agreements. (a)&nbsp;The Pledge Agreements dated as of the date
hereof and executed and delivered by each of the Borrower and certain of
its Subsidiaries to the Administrative Agent, for the ratable benefit of
the Banks and the Administrative Agent, pursuant to which, without
limitation, (i)&nbsp;all of the issued and outstanding capital stock of all
Subsidiaries (or, in the case of Foreign Subsidiaries, 65%), other than
Affiliated Subsidiaries, is pledged to the Administrative Agent, and (ii)
all of the issued and outstanding capital stock of the Affiliated
Subsidiaries and the


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">34
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">capital stock or other equity of minority-owned Persons, in each
case which is directly owned by the Borrower or any other member of the
Borrower Affiliated Group, is pledged to the Administrative Agent, (b)
all Pledge Agreements to be delivered by the Borrower from time to time
in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.2(d) and the definition of Permitted
Acquisitions, and (c)&nbsp;any other Pledge Agreements dated after the date
hereof and executed and delivered by any Domestic Subsidiary who is a
member of the Borrower Affiliated Group to the Administrative Agent, for
the ratable benefit of the Banks and the Administrative Agent.&#148;


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.6 Amendment of Section&nbsp;1.1. The definition of &#147;Patent and Trademark
Security Agreements&#148; contained in Section&nbsp;1.1 of the Loan Agreement is amended
to read in its entirety as follows:



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Patent and Trademark Security Agreements. (a)&nbsp;The Patent and
Trademark Security Agreements dated as of the date hereof and executed
and delivered by the Borrower and each Domestic Subsidiary who is a
member of the Borrower Affiliated Group to the Administrative Agent for
the ratable benefit of the Banks, and (b)&nbsp;any other Patent and Trademark
Security Agreements dated after the date hereof and executed and
delivered by a Domestic Subsidiary who is a member of the Borrower
Affiliated Group to the Administrative Agent, for the ratable benefit of
the Banks and the Administrative Agent.&#148;


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.7 Amendment of Section&nbsp;1.1. Clause (viii)&nbsp;of the definition of
&#147;Permitted Acquisition&#148; contained in Section&nbsp;1.1 of the Loan Agreement is
amended to read in its entirety as follows:



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;(viii)&nbsp;the aggregate consideration (including all cash and non-cash
consideration and any assumption of Indebtedness, but excluding any
Equity Securities of the Borrower) for such acquisitions which do not
constitute Investments, together with all Investments made pursuant to
clause (viii)&nbsp;of the definition of Qualified Investments (but not any
other provision of such definition), from and after November&nbsp;2, 2003,
shall not exceed, when made, the sum of $105,000,000 plus 50% of the
Borrower&#146;s Cumulative Excess Cash Flow.&#148;


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is understood and agreed by the Borrower that, for purposes of
determining the Borrower&#146;s compliance with clause (viii)&nbsp;of the definition of
Permitted Acquisition, the permitted basket in effect prior to the Amendment
Effective Date shall continue to govern such compliance for all periods ending
on or prior to November&nbsp;1, 2003.


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.8. Amendment of Section&nbsp;6.9(b). Section&nbsp;6.9(b) is hereby amended and
restated in its entirety as follows:



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">&#147;(b) the Borrower may effect redemptions and repurchases of its stock and
pay dividends to its stockholders, provided that, with respect to this
clause (b), (x)&nbsp;no Default or Event of Default has occurred or is
continuing, both before and after giving effect to any such
distributions, dividends, redemptions, repurchases and payments, and (y)
the cumulative aggregate amount of redemptions and repurchases made from
and after November&nbsp;2, 2003, shall not exceed, when made, an aggregate
amount equal to the sum of $105,000,000 plus 15% of the Borrower&#146;s
Cumulative Excess Cash Flow.&#148;


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;It is understood and agreed by the Borrower that, for purposes of
determining the Borrower&#146;s compliance with Section&nbsp;6.9(b), the permitted basket
in effect prior to the Amendment Effective Date shall continue to govern such
compliance for all periods ending on or prior to November&nbsp;1, 2003.


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>3.&nbsp;Effectiveness. </B>This Amendment shall become effective on the first date
when the following conditions are met (the &#147;Amendment Effective Date&#148;):



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">(a)&nbsp;the Administrative Agent shall have received counterparts hereof
signed by the Required Banks, all of the Guarantors and the Borrower (or,
in the case of any party as to which an executed counterpart shall not
have been received, the Administrative Agent shall have received in form


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">35
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">satisfactory to it a telecopy or other written confirmation from such
party of execution of a counterpart hereof by such party);



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">(b)&nbsp;the Administrative Agent shall have received stock certificates and
stock transfer powers executed in blank for all B&#038;N.com capital stock
owned by the Borrower as of the Amendment Effective Date (except for
stock certificates representing shares of Class&nbsp;A common stock of
B&#038;N.com), along with an updated Schedule&nbsp;1 to the B&#038;N.com Holding Corp.
Securities Collateral Pledge Agreement;



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">(c)&nbsp;the Administrative Agent shall have received payment of an amendment
fee for each Bank which shall have executed and delivered a counterpart
hereof as contemplated by clause (a), such amendment fee to be in an
amount equal to 0.10% of such Bank&#146;s Commitment; and



<P align="left" style="margin-left:4%; font-size: 10pt">(d)&nbsp;each of the Administrative Agent and the Arranger shall have
received payment of all other costs, fees and expenses (including,
without limitation, reasonable legal fees and expenses for which invoices
shall have been submitted to the Borrower) and other compensation payable
to any of the foregoing on or prior to the Amendment Effective Date in
connection with the Loan Documents.


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Promptly after the Amendment Effective Date occurs, the Administrative
Agent shall notify the Borrower and the Banks thereof, and such notice shall be
conclusive and binding on all parties hereto.


<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B>4.&nbsp;Ratification; Miscellaneous. </B>Except as amended hereby, all other
provisions, terms and conditions of the Credit Agreement and the other Loan
Documents are hereby ratified and confirmed and shall continue in full force
and effect. Each of the representations and warranties made by the Borrower or
any other member of the Borrower Affiliated Group in any of the Loan Documents
was true and correct when made and is true and correct in all material respects
on and as of the date hereof (except to the extent that such representations
and warranties relate expressly to an earlier date), and no Default or Event of
Default exists on the date hereof. This Amendment shall not be deemed a waiver
of any defaults that may exist under any of the Loan Documents. This Amendment
may be executed in any number of counterparts and by the different parties
hereto on separate counterparts, each of which when so executed and delivered
shall be an original, but all of which shall constitute one and the same
instrument. This Amendment and the rights and obligations of the parties
hereunder shall be construed in accordance with and governed by the law of the
State of New York without giving effect to the conflict of law principles
thereof.


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">36
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<P align="left" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Amendment No.&nbsp;3 to
Revolving Credit Agreement as of this 4th day of December, 2003.

<TR valign="bottom">
    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">
</DIV></TD>

    <TD valign="top"><DIV style="margin-left:0px; text-indent:-0px">&nbsp;</DIV></TD>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><B>BARNES &#038; NOBLE, INC.</B>

September&nbsp;1, 1998

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><B>BARNES &#038; NOBLE, INC. DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN</B>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left">
<A name="123"></A>
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><B>ARTICLE I. DEFINITIONS</B>



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.01</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Administrative Committee&#148; </B>shall mean the person or persons appointed by the
Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors to administer the Plan as provided in
Section&nbsp;8.01.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.02</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Associated Company&#148; </B>shall mean (a)&nbsp;any corporation that is a member of a controlled
group of corporations (as defined in Code Section&nbsp;414(b)) that includes the Company, (b)
any trade or business (whether or not incorporated) that is under common control (as
defined in Code Section&nbsp;414(c)) with the Company, (c)&nbsp;any member of an affiliated service
group (as defined in Code Section&nbsp;414(m)) that includes the Company; and (d)&nbsp;any other
entity required to be aggregated with the Company pursuant to final or temporary
regulations under Code Section&nbsp;414(o).</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.03</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Base Salary&#148; </B>shall mean the annual base fixed compensation paid periodically during the
calendar year, determined prior to any pre-tax contributions under a &#147;qualified cash or
deferred arrangement&#148; (as defined under Code Section 401(k) and its applicable regulations)
or under a &#147;cafeteria plan&#148; (as defined under Code Section&nbsp;125 and its applicable
regulations) and any deferrals under Article&nbsp;3, but excluding any overtime, bonuses, or any
other form of compensation; except to the extent otherwise deemed &#147;Base Salary&#148; for
purposes of the Plan under rules as are adopted by the Compensation Committee.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.04</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Beneficiary&#148; </B>shall mean the person or persons designated by a Participant pursuant to the
provisions of Section&nbsp;5.07 in a time and manner determined by the Administrative
Committee to receive the amounts, if any, payable under the Plan upon the death of the
Participant.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.05</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Bonus&#148; </B>shall mean the cash amount, if any, awarded to an employee of the Company
under the Company&#146;s executive bonus program, or other compensation program approved
by the Compensation Committee as a bonus hereunder.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.06</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Board of Directors&#148; or &#147;Board&#148; </B>shall mean the Board of Directors of the Corporation.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.07</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Change of Control&#148; </B>shall mean an event which shall occur if:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>a report on Schedule&nbsp;13D shall be filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission
pursuant to Section 13(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the &#147;Act&#148;) disclosing
that any person (within the meaning of Section 13(d) of the Act), other than the
Corporation or a subsidiary of the Corporation or any employee benefit plan sponsored
by the Corporation or a subsidiary of the Corporation or any member of the Riggio
Group, is the beneficial owner directly or indirectly of twenty percent or more of the
outstanding common stock of the Corporation; (and such person did not have such
twenty percent or more beneficial ownership on April&nbsp;1, 1997).</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<P><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>


<P align="right" style="font-size: 10pt">Page 2



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>the stockholders of the Corporation shall approve (i)&nbsp;any consolidation or merger of the
Corporation in which the Corporation is not the continuing or surviving corporation or
pursuant to which shares of common stock of the Corporation would be converted into
cash, securities or other property, other than a merger of the Corporation (1)&nbsp;in which
holders of common stock of the Corporation immediately prior to the merger have
substantially the same proportionate ownership of common stock of the surviving
corporation immediately after the merger as immediately before or (2)&nbsp;with or into any
Corporation which is directly or indirectly controlled by one or more members of the
Riggio Group, or (ii)&nbsp;any sale, lease, exchange or other transfer (in one transaction or a
series of related transactions) of all or substantially all the assets of the Corporation; or</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>there shall have been a change in a majority of the members of the Board of Directors
within a 12-month period, unless the election or nomination for election by the
Corporation&#146;s stockholders of each new director during such 12-month period was
approved by the vote of two-thirds of the directors then still in office who were
directors at the beginning of such 12-month period.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.08</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Code&#148; </B>shall mean the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended from time to time.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.09</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Company&#148; </B>shall mean the Corporation, and any successor thereto, with respect to its
employees and any Associated Company authorized by the Compensation Committee to
participate in the Plan, with respect to their employees.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.10</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Compensation Committee&#148; </B>shall mean the Compensation Committee of the Board of
Directors.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.11</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Corporation&#148; </B>shall mean Barnes &#038; Noble, Inc., a Delaware corporation, or any successor
by merger, purchase or otherwise.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.12</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Deferral Account&#148; </B>shall mean the bookkeeping account maintained for each Participant
to record the amount of Base Salary and/or Bonus such Participant has elected to defer in
accordance with Article&nbsp;3, adjusted pursuant to Article&nbsp;4.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.13</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Deferral Agreement&#148; </B>shall mean the completed agreement, including any amendments,
attachments and appendices thereto, in such form approved by the Administrative
Committee, between an Eligible Executive and the Company, under which the Eligible
Executive agrees to defer a portion of his Base Salary and/or Bonus under the Plan.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.14</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Deferrals&#148; </B>shall mean the amount of deferrals credited to a Participant pursuant to Section
3.02.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.15</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Effective Date&#148; </B>shall mean April&nbsp;1, 1997.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<P><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>


<P align="right" style="font-size: 10pt">Page 3



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.16</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Employee&#148; </B>shall mean any person who is employed by the Company.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.17</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Eligible Executive&#148; </B>shall mean an Employee of the Company who is eligible to
participate in the Plan as provided in Section&nbsp;2.01.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.18</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;ERISA&#148; </B>shall mean the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended
from time to time.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.19</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Participant&#148; </B>shall mean, except as otherwise provided in Article&nbsp;2, each Eligible
Executive who has executed a Deferral Agreement pursuant to the requirements of Section
2.02 and is credited with an amount under Section&nbsp;3.03.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.20</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Plan&#148; </B>shall mean the Barnes &#038; Noble, Inc. Deferred Compensation Plan as set forth in
this document and the appendices thereto, as it may be amended from time to time.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.21</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Plan Year&#148; </B>shall mean the 12-month period commencing on any January 1; provided,
however, that the first Plan Year shall commence on April&nbsp;1, 1997 and end on December
31, 1997.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.22</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Reporting Date&#148; </B>shall mean any day on which the New York Stock Exchange is open.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.23</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Retirement&#148; </B>shall mean any termination of employment by an Eligible Executive (i)&nbsp;after
the date the Eligible Executive has attained age 55 and has completed five &#147;Years of
Service&#148; (as such term is defined under the Barnes &#038; Noble, Inc. Retirement Plan as in
effect on the date of such termination) or (ii)&nbsp;as a result of his &#147;Total and Permanent
Disability&#148; (as such term is defined under the Barnes &#038; Noble, Inc. 401(k) Savings Plan as
in effect on the date of such termination).</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">1.24</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>&#147;Riggio Group&#148; </B>shall mean Leonard Riggio, his spouse, his siblings and any lineal
descendants or ancestors of Leonard Riggio or any of his siblings, any trusts for the benefit
of any of the foregoing, and any corporation or other entity directly or indirectly controlled
by any of the foregoing.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<P><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>


<P align="right" style="font-size: 10pt">Page 4


<DIV align="left">
<A name="124"></A>
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><B>ARTICLE 2. PARTICIPATION</B>



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">2.01</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Eligibility</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>An Employee whose Base Salary as of October 1 of a calendar year exceeds $130,000, shall
be an Eligible Executive with respect to the Plan Year following such calendar year and
thereby eligible to participate in this Plan and execute a Deferral Agreement authorizing
Deferrals under this Plan with respect to his Base Salary or Bonus which would otherwise
be payable in the Plan Year following such October 1.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>An Employee who is first employed or reemployed after October 1 of a calendar year, and
whose Base Salary on such employment or reemployment date, whichever is applicable,
exceeds $130,000 shall be an Eligible Executive with respect to the following Plan Year
and thereby eligible to participate in the Plan with respect to his Base Salary or Bonus
which is otherwise paid in the Plan Year following his date of employment or
reemployment, whichever is applicable.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Notwithstanding the foregoing, an Employee who is first employed or reemployed on or
after January&nbsp;1, 1997 and whose Base Salary on such date of employment or reemployment,
whichever is applicable, exceeds $130,000 shall be an Eligible Executive with respect to the
Plan Year in which his date of employment or reemployment occurs and thereby eligible to
participate in the Plan with respect to such Plan Year, subject to the provisions of Section
3.01(a)(v).</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">2.02</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>In General</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>An individual who is determined to be an Eligible Executive with respect to a Plan Year
and who desires to have deferrals credited on his behalf pursuant to Article&nbsp;3 for such Plan
Year must execute a Deferral Agreement with the Administrative Committee authorizing
Deferrals under this Plan for such year in accordance with the provisions of Sections&nbsp;3.01
and 3.02.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Deferral Agreement shall be in writing and be properly completed upon a form
approved by the Administrative Committee, which shall be the sole judge of the proper
completion thereof. Such Deferral Agreement shall provide, subject to the provisions of
Section&nbsp;3.02, for the deferral of a portion of the Eligible Executive&#146;s Base Salary and/or
Bonus earned after the effective date of the election and shall include such other provisions
as the Administrative Committee deems appropriate.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">2.03</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Termination of Participation</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Participation shall cease when all benefits to which a Participant is entitled to hereunder are
distributed to him.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<P><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>


<P align="right" style="font-size: 10pt">Page 5



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If a former Participant who has terminated employment with the Company and whose
participation in the Plan ceased under Section&nbsp;2.03(a) is reemployed as an Eligible
Executive, the former Participant may again become a Participant in accordance with the
provisions of Section&nbsp;2.01.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;

<P><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<DIV align="left">
<A name="125"></A>
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><B>ARTICLE 3. DEFERRALS</B>



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">3.01</TD>
    <TD width="4%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Filing Requirements</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="4%" align="center">(i)</TD>
    <TD>An Employee who is determined to be an Eligible Executive on the basis of his
Base Salary on October&nbsp;1, 1996 in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.01(a) may elect,
subject to Section&nbsp;3.02(a), to defer a portion of his Base Salary that is otherwise
earned and payable in the 1997 Plan Year by filing a Deferral Agreement with the
Administrative Committee prior to the close of business on the fifth business day
following the Effective Date. Notwithstanding any other provision to the contrary,
an election to defer any part of Base Salary payable in the 1997 Plan Year filed with
the Administrative Committee on or before the Effective Date shall be effective
only with respect to Base Salary earned and payable on and after the Effective Date.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(ii)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Prior to the close of business on October 1 of any Plan Year commencing on or after
the Effective Date, an Employee who is determined to be an Eligible Executive on
the basis of his Base Salary on such October 1 in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.01(b)
may elect, subject to Section&nbsp;3.02(a), to defer a portion of his Base Salary that is
otherwise earned and payable in the Plan Year following such October 1 and/or a
portion of his Bonus otherwise payable in the Plan Year following such October 1
by filing a Deferral Agreement with the Administrative Committee.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(iii)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In the event October 1 does not fall on a business day, such filing must be made by
the close of business on the next business day.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(iv)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Notwithstanding the foregoing, if an Employee becomes an Eligible Executive with
respect to a Plan Year pursuant to the provisions of Section&nbsp;2.01(b) he may elect,
subject to Section&nbsp;3.02(a), to defer a portion of his Base Salary or Bonus which
would otherwise be payable in the Plan Year next following his date of employment
or reemployment, by filing a Deferral Agreement with the Administrative
Committee prior to the close of business on the tenth business day following the
date of his employment or reemployment, whichever is applicable; provided,
however that the Bonus may be deferred only if the amount otherwise payable in
that year has not already been determined by appropriate action of the Company.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(v)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Notwithstanding the foregoing, if an Employee becomes an Eligible Executive with
respect to a Plan Year pursuant to the provisions of Section&nbsp;2.01(c) he may elect,
subject to Section&nbsp;3.02(a), to defer a portion of his Base Salary or Bonus otherwise
payable in that Plan Year by filing a Deferral Agreement with the Administrative
Committee prior to the close of business on the tenth business day following the
date of his employment or reemployment, whichever is applicable. Such Deferral
Agreement shall be effective only with respect to Base Salary and Bonus otherwise
payable to the Eligible Executive commencing with the first practicable payroll</TD>
</TR>


</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>


<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<P><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>


<P align="right" style="font-size: 10pt">Page 7



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>period following the Administrative Committee&#146;s receipt of the
Deferral Agreement; provided however, Bonus may only be deferred
if the Bonus otherwise payable in that Plan Year has not already
been determined by appropriate action of the Company.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>A Participant&#146;s election to defer a portion of Base Salary or Bonus for
any Plan Year shall become irrevocable on the last day the deferral of
such Base Salary or Bonus may be elected under Section&nbsp;3.01(a). A
Participant may revoke or change his election to defer a portion of Base
Salary or Bonus at any time prior to the date the election becomes
irrevocable. Any such revocation or change shall be made in a form and
manner determined by the Administrative Committee.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Except as otherwise provided in Section&nbsp;3.01(a)(v), a Participant&#146;s
Deferral Agreement shall apply only with respect to Base Salary earned in
the calendar year following the calendar year in which the Deferral
Agreement is filed with the Administrative Committee under Section
3.01(a). A Participant&#146;s Deferral Agreement shall only apply to a Bonus
determined after the Deferral Agreement is filed with the Administrative
Committee under Section&nbsp;3.01(a). Subject to the provisions of Section
3.02, an Eligible Executive must file, in accordance with the provisions
of Section&nbsp;3.01(a), a new Deferral Agreement for each Plan Year the
Eligible Executive is eligible for and elects to defer a portion of Bonus
or Base Salary.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(d)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If a Participant ceases to be an Eligible Executive on the basis of his
Base Salary as of October 1 of a calendar year but continues to be
employed by the Company, he shall continue to be a Participant and his
Deferral Agreement currently in effect for the Plan Year in which such
October 1 occurs shall remain in force for the remainder of such Plan
Year, but such Participant shall not be eligible to defer any portion of
his Base Salary or Bonus earned in a subsequent Plan Year until such time
as he shall once again become an Eligible Executive.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">3.02</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Amount of Deferral</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="center">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%" align="center">(i)</TD>
    <TD><DIV style="margin-left:8px; text-indent:-8px">&nbsp;&nbsp;An Eligible Executive may defer for any Plan Year a
specified dollar amount of his Base Salary otherwise earned and
payable in that Plan Year, provided such amount is not less than
$5,000 and does not exceed 50% of his Base Salary payable in that
Plan Year.</DIV></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="right">(ii)</TD>
    <TD><DIV style="margin-left:8px; text-indent:-8px">&nbsp;&nbsp;An Eligible Executive may defer for any Plan Year commencing
on and after January&nbsp;1, 1998 a specified dollar amount of his Bonus
otherwise payable in that Plan Year, provided such amount is not
less than $2,500 and does not exceed 100% of his Bonus payable in
that Plan Year.</DIV></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Administrative Committee may establish other maximum or minimum
limits on the amount of Base Salary or Bonus which may be deferred and/or
the timing of such deferral.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<P><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>


<P align="right" style="font-size: 10pt">Page 8



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Eligible Executives shall be given written notice of any such limits at
least ten business days prior to the date they take effect.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Notwithstanding anything in this Plan to the contrary, if an Eligible
Executive:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(i)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>receives a withdrawal of deferred cash contributions on
account of hardship from any plan which is maintained by the Company
and which meets the requirements of Code Section 401(k) (or any
successor thereto); and</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(ii)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>is precluded from making contributions to such 401(k) plan
for at least 12&nbsp;months after receipt of the hardship withdrawal;</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>no amounts shall be deferred under this Plan under the Eligible
Executive&#146;s Deferral Agreement with respect to Base Salary or Bonus until
such time as the Eligible Executive is again permitted to contribute to
such 401(k) plan. Any Base Salary or Bonus payment which would have been
deferred pursuant to a Deferral Agreement but for the application of this
Section&nbsp;3.02(c) shall be paid to the Eligible Executive as if he had not
entered into the Deferral Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">3.03</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Crediting to Deferral Account</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The amount of Deferrals shall be credited to such Participant&#146;s Deferral
Account no later than the first business day of the first calendar month
following the date the Base Salary or Bonus would have been paid to the
Participant in the absence of a Deferral Agreement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">3.04</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Vesting</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>A Participant shall at all times be 100% vested in his Deferral Account.</TD>
</TR>


</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><B>ARTICLE 4. MAINTENANCE OF ACCOUNTS</B>



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">4.01</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Adjustment of Account</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>As of each Reporting Date, each Deferral Account shall be credited or
debited with the amount of earnings or losses with which such Deferral
Account would have been credited or debited, assuming it had been invested
in one or more investment funds, or earned the rate of return of one or
more indices of investment performance, designated by the Administrative
Committee and elected by the Participant pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.02 for
purposes of measuring the investment performance of his Deferral Account.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Administrative Committee shall designate at least one investment fund
or index of investment performance and may designate other investment
funds or investment indices to be used to measure the investment
performance of a Participant&#146;s Deferral Account. The designation of any
such investment funds or indices shall not require the Company to invest
or earmark their general assets in any specific manner. The
Administrative Committee may change the designation of investment funds or
indices from time to time, in its sole discretion, and any such change
shall not be deemed to be an amendment affecting Participants&#146; rights
under Section&nbsp;6.02. The Administrative Committee shall provide
Participants with an advance notice of any changes in the designation of
investment funds or indices.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">4.02</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Investment Performance Elections</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In the event the Administrative Committee designates more than one
investment fund or index of investment performance under Section&nbsp;4.01,
each Participant shall file an investment election with the
Administrative Committee with respect to the investment of his Deferral
Account within such time period and on such form as the Administrative
Committee may prescribe. The election shall designate the investment
fund or funds or index or indices of investment performance which shall
be used to measure the investment performance of the Participant&#146;s
Deferral Account.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">4.03</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Changing Investment Elections</B></TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>A Participant may change his election of the investment fund
or funds or index or indices of investment performance used to
measure the future investment performance of his future Deferrals
within such time periods and in such manner prescribed by the
Administrative Committee. The
election shall be effective as soon as administratively
practicable after the date on which the notice is timely filed.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>A Participant may change his election of investment funds or
index or indices of investment performance used to measure the
future investment performance of his existing account balance within
such time periods and in such manner prescribed by</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>the Administrative Committee. The election shall be effective as
soon as administratively practicable after the date on which the
notice is timely filed.</TD>

<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">4.04</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Individual Accounts</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Administrative Committee shall maintain, or cause to be maintained on
its books, records showing the individual balance of each Participant&#146;s
Deferral Account. At least once a calendar quarter each Participant
shall be furnished with a statement setting forth the value of his
Deferral Account.</TD>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Valuation of Accounts</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Administrative Committee shall value or cause to be valued each
Participant&#146;s Deferral Account on each Reporting Date. On each Reporting
Date there shall be allocated to the Deferral Account of each Participant
the appropriate amount determined in accordance with Section&nbsp;4.01.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Whenever an event requires a determination of the value of Participant&#146;s
Deferral Account, the value shall be computed as of the Reporting Date
coincident with, or immediately following, the date of the event.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><B>ARTICLE 5. PAYMENT OF BENEFITS</B>



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">5.01</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Commencement of Payment</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The distribution of the portion of Participant&#146;s Deferral Account
attributable to deferrals of Base Salary or Bonus for each Plan Year made
pursuant to the Deferral Agreement applicable to such Plan Year shall
commence, pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02, on or as soon as practicable after the
occurrence of one of the following events, as designated by the
Participant on such Deferral Agreement:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(i)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>the month following the Participant&#146;s Retirement;</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(ii)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>the month following the Participant&#146;s termination of employment; or</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="6%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(iii)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>the beginning of a designated year not later than the year
in which the Participant would attain age 70-1/2.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In the event a Participant elects (iii)&nbsp;above, he may not elect a year
that commences less than three (3)&nbsp;full calendar years subsequent to the
calendar year in which the amount is first treated as being credited to
the Participant&#146;s Deferral Account.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Notwithstanding the foregoing, in the event a Participant terminates
employment or retires prior to the designated distribution event date
elected pursuant to paragraph (a)(iii) above, the distribution of his
entire Deferral Account shall commence, pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02, as soon
as practicable after the month following his termination of employment or
Retirement.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>A Participant shall not change his designation of the event which
entitles him to distribution of any portion of his Deferral Account,
except as otherwise provided in Section&nbsp;5.03 below.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">5.02</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Method of Payment</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Except as otherwise provided in the second and third sentences of this
paragraph (a)&nbsp;and paragraph (b)&nbsp;below, the distribution of the portion of
the Participant&#146;s Deferral Account attributable to deferrals of Base
Salary or Bonus made pursuant to a particular Deferral Agreement shall be
made in cash in a single lump sum. However, with respect to a Participant
who elects payments to commence pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.01(a)(i), at the
time such Participant makes an election of a
distribution event date under Section&nbsp;5.01 the Participant may also elect
that the portion of his Deferral Account attributable to deferrals of
Base Salary or Bonus made pursuant to Deferral Agreements for Plan Years
commencing prior to January&nbsp;1, 1999 shall be made payable as of such
distribution event date in ratable annual cash installments for a period
of years, not to exceed 15&nbsp;years, designated by the Participant on his
Deferral Agreement instead of in a single lump sum cash payment.
Effective as of September&nbsp;1, 1998, if a Participant elects to commence
payments of the</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt">&nbsp;
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<P><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>


<P align="right" style="font-size: 10pt">Page 12



<P>
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>portion of his Deferral Account attributable to deferrals of Base Salary
or Bonus applicable to a Plan Year commencing on or after January&nbsp;1, 1999
pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.01(a)(i), such Participant may also elect at the
time he makes an election of a distribution event date under Section&nbsp;5.01
regarding a deferral of Base Salary or Bonus made pursuant to a Deferral
Agreement applicable to a Plan Year commencing on or after January&nbsp;1,
1999 to have the portion of his Deferral Account attributable to such
deferral payable as of such distribution event date in ratable annual
installments for a period of years, not to exceed 15&nbsp;years, as designated
by the Participant on his Deferral Agreement, instead of in a single lump
sum cash payment.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>During an installment payment period, the Participant&#146;s Deferral Account
shall continue to be credited with earnings or losses as described in
Section&nbsp;4.01. The first installment or lump sum payment shall be made as
soon as administratively practicable following the Reporting Date
coincident with or preceding the applicable distribution event date
designated pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.01 or 5.03. However, in the event
payment is to be made pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.01(b), the lump sum payment
shall be made as soon as administratively practicable following the
Reporting Date coincident with or next following the Participant&#146;s
termination of employment or date of Retirement, if earlier. Subsequent
installments, if any, shall be paid as soon as practicable following the
beginning of the following calendar year and each subsequent year of the
installment period. The amount of each installment shall equal the
balance of the portion of the Participant&#146;s Deferral Account subject to
such installment payment option as of each Reporting Date of
determination divided by the number of remaining installments (including
the installment being determined).</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If a Participant dies before payment of the entire balance of his
Deferral Account, an amount equal to the unpaid portion thereof as of the
date of his death shall be payable in one lump sum to his Beneficiary as
soon as practicable after the Reporting Date coincident with or next
following the Participant&#146;s date of death.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>A Participant shall not change his method of payment, except as otherwise
provided in Section&nbsp;5.03 below.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">5.03</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD><B>Change of Distribution Election</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD colspan="5">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%" nowrap align="right">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>A Participant may change his elections under Section&nbsp;5.01 or Section&nbsp;5.02
at any time by duly completing, executing, and filing with the
Administrative Committee a new election on an appropriate form designated
by the Administrative Committee<B>; </B><I>provided however</I><B><I>, </I></B>that for any such
change of election to be effective, a full calendar year must pass
between the calendar year during which the Participant duly makes the
change of election and the calendar year during which any portion of the
Participant&#146;s Deferral Account is first to become payable after taking
the change of election into account.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
